explains: n. [数] 连续统；[经] 连续统一体；闭联集
wordGroup: continuum mechanics 连续介质力学
continuum theory 连续介质理论
continuum damage mechanics 连续损伤力学

sentences.en: These various complaints are part of a continuum of ill-health.
sentences.cn: 这些不同的抱怨是健康连续欠佳的一部分。

sentences.en: Along the continuum of abilities are hundreds of thousands of gifted men and women, boys and girls.
sentences.cn: 成千上万的天才男女都处在能力的连续统上。

sentences.en: What Hall believes is that cultures can be classified by placing them on a continuum ranging from what he called high-context to low-context.
sentences.cn: 霍尔认为，文化可以通过将其放在一个连续统一体上进行分类，从他所说的高语境到低语境。
